summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2000 MERCURY GRAND MARQUIS. WHILE DRIVING  APPROXIMATELY 30 MPH, THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS FAILED. SHE WAS ABLE TO DRIVE HOME SAFELY. A MECHANIC FROM A REPAIR FACILITY ADVISED HER TO CALL THE DEALER IN REFERENCE TO RECALL # 00V138000(VISIBILITY:WINDSHIELD WIPER/WASHER).  AN APPOINTMENT WAS SET WITH THE DEALER FOR 01/04/2010. THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 84,108. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 84,090.
